plot: A tree doctor has an encounter with a dying oak, and this wakens a memory of her childhood. The story takes place in an aging wood, in a shimmering magic lantern show, in the Theatre of Life and Death.
title: The Cardiac Oak
plot_es: A tree doctor has an encounter with a dying oak, and this wakens a memory of her childhood. The story takes place in an aging wood, in a shimmering magic lantern show, in the Theatre of Life and Death.
plot_en: A tree doctor has an encounter with a dying oak, and this wakens a memory of her childhood. The story takes place in an aging wood, in a shimmering magic lantern show, in the Theatre of Life and Death.
